rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {IAR2113, IAR2303}

description: This unit and IAR2113 are key units for developing the essence of interior architecture practice. In this unit, the focus is on extending and mastering the range of factors covered in IAR2113 to achieve high quality technical, historical, symbolic, aesthetic and social design solutions
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
